Basic examples¶

DSSP analysis¶

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: pdb = pt.load_pdb_rcsb("1l2y")

In [3]: result = pt.dssp(pdb)

In [4]: print(result)
[['ASN:1' 'LEU:2' 'TYR:3' ..., 'PRO:18' 'PRO:19' 'SER:20']
 [array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['H', 'T', '0', ..., 'H', '0', 'T'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['H', 'H', 'H', ..., 'H', 'H', 'H'], 
      dtype='<U1') ...,
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')
  array(['0', '0', '0', ..., '0', '0', '0'], 
      dtype='<U1')]]
